analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/3/0xc22462d4bc50952b061c9e6c585fdd9a04d0d75a.sol#83-84) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/3/0xc22462d4bc50952b061c9e6c585fdd9a04d0d75a.sol#181-217)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/3/0xc22462d4bc50952b061c9e6c585fdd9a04d0d75a.sol#296-319)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0xc22462d4bc50952b061c9e6c585fdd9a04d0d75a.sol#390-404)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0xc22462d4bc50952b061c9e6c585fdd9a04d0d75a.sol#408-425)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/3/0xc22462d4bc50952b061c9e6c585fdd9a04d0d75a.sol#490-494) is declared view but contains assembly code
